title: Delta Guard Development
description: A project to develop the Delta Guard accelerator for monitoring delta tables and alerting users of discrepancies.

epics.title: Epic 1: Requirements Gathering and Design
epics.description: Collect requirements and design the architecture for Delta Guard.

stories.title: Story 1: User Requirements Collection
stories.description: Gather and document user requirements for monitoring delta tables.
acceptance_criteria: All user requirements are documented and approved by stakeholders
User scenarios and use cases are created and validated

tasks.title: Task 1: Schedule User Interviews
tasks.description: Organize meetings with key stakeholders to discuss requirements.

tasks.title: Task 2: Conduct User Interviews
tasks.description: Perform interviews to gather detailed requirements.

tasks.title: Task 3: Compile Requirements Document
tasks.description: Create a comprehensive requirements document from the interviews.

stories.title: Story 2: Architecture Design
stories.description: Design the architecture of the Delta Guard solution.
acceptance_criteria: Architecture diagram is created and reviewed
Technology stack is selected and documented

tasks.title: Task 1: Research Existing Solutions
tasks.description: Investigate existing monitoring solutions for delta tables.

tasks.title: Task 2: Create Initial Architecture Diagram
tasks.description: Draft an initial architecture diagram for the Delta Guard.

tasks.title: Task 3: Revise Architecture Based on Feedback
tasks.description: Incorporate feedback from stakeholders into the architecture.

epics.title: Epic 2: Implementation of Monitoring Features
epics.description: Develop the core functionalities to monitor delta tables.

stories.title: Story 1: Schema Drift Detection
stories.description: Implement functionality to detect schema drift in delta tables.
acceptance_criteria: Schema drift alerts are triggered when discrepancies are found
Alert notifications are sent to user-defined channels

tasks.title: Task 1: Define Schema Comparison Logic
tasks.description: Create logic to compare current and previous schema of delta tables.

tasks.title: Task 2: Develop Alerting Mechanism
tasks.description: Implement alerting system to notify users of schema changes.

tasks.title: Task 3: Unit Testing for Schema Drift
tasks.description: Write unit tests to validate schema drift detection functionality.

stories.title: Story 2: Volume Drift Monitoring
stories.description: Create functionality to track volume drift in delta tables.
acceptance_criteria: Volume drift alerts are generated for defined thresholds
Users can configure volume thresholds through the UI

tasks.title: Task 1: Establish Volume Tracking Logic
tasks.description: Implement logic to monitor delta table volume changes.

tasks.title: Task 2: Configure UI for Volume Thresholds
tasks.description: Develop UI components for users to set volume thresholds.

tasks.title: Task 3: Functional Testing for Volume Drift
tasks.description: Execute functional tests to verify volume drift monitoring.

stories.title: Story 3: Data Quality Rules Integration
stories.description: Integrate general data quality (DQ) rules into Delta Guard.
acceptance_criteria: DQ rules are executed on a schedule and alerts generated
Users can define their own DQ rules via configuration

tasks.title: Task 1: Compile DQ Rules Library
tasks.description: Collect common data quality rules for implementation.

tasks.title: Task 2: Develop Rule Execution Engine
tasks.description: Create an engine to execute DQ rules on delta tables.

tasks.title: Task 3: Create UI for Custom DQ Rule Definition
tasks.description: Build UI elements allowing users to define and manage custom DQ rules.

epics.title: Epic 3: Testing and Deployment
epics.description: Complete testing and deploy the Delta Guard solution.

stories.title: Story 1: Integration Testing
stories.description: Conduct integration testing to ensure all components work together.
acceptance_criteria: All components pass integration tests without errors
Integration testing reports are generated

tasks.title: Task 1: Develop Integration Test Plan
tasks.description: Create a plan that outlines the scope of integration testing.

tasks.title: Task 2: Execute Integration Tests
tasks.description: Run integration tests on the developed components.

tasks.title: Task 3: Log and Resolve Integration Issues
tasks.description: Document any issues found and work to resolve them.

stories.title: Story 2: User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
stories.description: Perform user acceptance testing with stakeholders.
acceptance_criteria: UAT feedback is collected from all participants
All critical issues identified in UAT are resolved

tasks.title: Task 1: Prepare UAT Environment
tasks.description: Set up an environment for UAT with stakeholders.

tasks.title: Task 2: Conduct UAT Sessions
tasks.description: Facilitate sessions where stakeholders can test the solution.

tasks.title: Task 3: Compile and Review UAT Feedback
tasks.description: Gather feedback from the UAT sessions for analysis.

stories.title: Story 3: Deployment to Production
stories.description: Deploy the Delta Guard solution to the production environment.
acceptance_criteria: Delta Guard is successfully deployed to the production environment
Deployment documentation is completed and shared

tasks.title: Task 1: Plan Deployment Steps
tasks.description: Finalize and document steps required for production deployment.

tasks.title: Task 2: Conduct Production Deployment
tasks.description: Follow the deployment steps to release Delta Guard to production.

tasks.title: Task 3: Monitor Post-Deployment Performance
tasks.description: Monitor the solution for any post-deployment issues or errors.

epics.title: Epic 4: Documentation and Training
epics.description: Create documentation and training material for Delta Guard users.

stories.title: Story 1: User Documentation
stories.description: Develop comprehensive user documentation for Delta Guard.
acceptance_criteria: User documentation is created and accessible
Documentation is validated by stakeholders for clarity

tasks.title: Task 1: Outline Documentation Structure
tasks.description: Create an outline for user documentation content.

tasks.title: Task 2: Write Documentation Content
tasks.description: Draft the documentation covering all features and functionalities.

tasks.title: Task 3: Review Documentation with Users
tasks.description: Solicit feedback from users on the drafted documentation.

stories.title: Story 2: Training Material Creation
stories.description: Design training materials and sessions for Delta Guard users.
acceptance_criteria: Training materials are developed and reviewed
Training sessions are conducted with user groups

tasks.title: Task 1: Identify Training Topics
tasks.description: List key topics that need to be covered in training.

tasks.title: Task 2: Create Presentation Materials
tasks.description: Develop slides and materials for training sessions.

tasks.title: Task 3: Schedule and Conduct Training Sessions
tasks.description: Organize training sessions for users to attend and learn.
